typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		runtime as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as string,
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document') ~> MoviesTitle
MoviesTitle select(mapColumn(
		id,
		title,
		movieruntimemin = runtime,
		rating,
		genre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMovies
Category keyGenerate(output(MovieSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> MovieSK
SelectMovies join(rating == MovieRatingDescription,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Ratings
MovieSK select(mapColumn(
		id,
		title,
		movieruntimemin,
		rating,
		MovieRatingSK,
		MovieRatingDescription,
		MovieSK,
		MovieCategorySK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMoviesCategory
SelectMoviesCategory derive(MovieSK = toInteger(MovieSK),
		movieruntimemin = toInteger(movieruntimemin)) ~> AllColumnsSK
Ratings join(genre == MovieCategoryDescription,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Category
AllColumnsSK sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimMovies
